mapper.select: select U.user_code as "userCode", U.user_name as "userName", U.user_birth as "userBirth", U.user_tel as "userTel", U.user_email as "userEmail", U.user_team_code as "userTeamCode", U.user_hire_date as "userHireDate", U.user_resign_date as "userResignDate" from userinfo U where U.user_code < 20000 order by U.user_code desc
mapper.insert: insert into userInfo(user_code, user_password, user_name, user_birth, user_tel, user_email,user_team_code, user_hire_Date) values (#{userCode}, #{userPassword}, #{userName}, #{userBirth}, #{userTel}, #{userEmail}, #{userTeamCode}, #{userHireDate})
mapper.select: SELECT C.center_code AS "centerCode" , C.center_name AS "centerName" , C.center_address AS "centerAddress" FROM mapping M JOIN center C ON M.center_code = C.center_code WHERE M.user_code = #{userCode}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM mapping WHERE center_code = #{centerCode} AND user_code = #{userCode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mapping (center_code, user_code, mapping_date) VALUES (#{centerCode}, #{userCode}, SYSDATE)
